entities.description: A unique numeric identifier for each offender.
The frequency count of each offender number.
The percentage representation of each offender number, unweighted.
Indicates the frequency and percentage of missing data in the survey.
The number of valid cases considered in the analysis.
The total number of cases surveyed.
Descriptive statistics of the frequency data including mean, median, mode, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.

relationships.description: Indicates the unweighted frequency count associated with each offender number.
Defines the percentage representation of each offender number in the total survey.
Indicates the extent of missing data within the survey results.
Provides descriptive statistics of the unweighted frequency data.
Indicates the number of valid cases within the survey.
Indicates the total number of cases surveyed.
